game_description: You must protect the sleepwalker. They are being shot at. Stop time. Grab the bullets. Point them back at the enemy! A game by krishGames. Made with the Godot Engine.
review_1: Have you fixed the issue yet also I don’t have enough memory to play it now
review_2: Neat use of “bullet time” (pun intended lol) without feeling like an attempt to clone super hot. Innovative full room scale when full room scale apps are still pretty rare. Some type of dramatic background music (with a toggle on/off) could even further enhance the app. Made it to level 7 so far and there is a good smooth difficulty curve. Definitely getting more challenging!
